snippet.title: BOKKIE - NEW MASCOT HORROR GAME ( AVAILABLE NOW ON STEAM )
snippet.description:
BOKKIE" is a chilling mascot horror game developed by AJB GAMES STUDIO , set in a kindergarten and school where a dark secret lies beneath—a toys factory run by the school's director. The once-friendly BOKKIE toys are now malevolent and roaming free. As a detective, explore the eerie school, solve puzzles, and confront haunted toys to unravel the sinister mysteries hidden within the shadows. Brace yourself for a short, intense adventure where reality and nightmare collide in "BOKKIE." 

BOKKIE DEMO on Steam : 

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2880530/BOKKIE/

BOKKIE DEMO on Itchio  : 

https://ajbstudio.itch.io/bokkie-demo
